item.description:
The Agenda



Have you ever wondered why America has Changed so drastically in the last few years? Is it just the natural moral and spiritual decay of a culture or is there something else behind it? The makers of the Documentary "The Agenda" believe there is something behind it and they documented it, in the video the "Agenda"

You are invited to come and hear 16 well known Americans share their beliefs on what is behind the decline of American morals and spirituality. The Documentary will be shown next Friday night December 3 at 7:00 PM at the Salmon Falls Road Church of Christ, 336 Salmon falls Road, Rochester N.H.

You can see a free trailer at http://agendadocument...

Directions to the building : Take Rt. 202 to intersection of Salmon Falls Road and 202 turn on Salmon Falls Road toward Milton and watch for sign about 500 yards on right. There will also be a children's video for the children. For more information Call Lyle Duell at 207-651-0703.
item.name: The "AGENDA" viewing
